interface_specification_complete.notes: Complete agent-to-agent JSON protocol spec with input/output schemas, finding types, and state entry format. Not OpenAPI (no REST endpoints) -- appropriate for agent prompt+config feature.

all_modules_designed.notes: 5 deliverables designed: M4 agent definition, orchestrator update, cross-validation SKILL, manifest entries, consolidation skill update. Clear responsibilities for each.

ui_wireframes_exist.notes: 6 wireframes showing CLI terminal output at each stage (M1-M3 running, M4 running, success with findings, clean pass, M4 skipped, backward compatible). No GUI for this feature.

user_flows_documented.notes: 3 Mermaid diagrams: happy path with fail-open tiers, verification status decision tree, M4 cross-validation data flow.

error_taxonomy_complete.notes: 5 finding types defined with severity, trigger conditions, AC references. 3 orchestrator error tiers defined (ADR-0003). Internal M4 error handling specified.

validation_rules_defined.notes: 10 input validation rules, 10 output validation rules, 4 pre-invocation rules, 5 severity assignment rules, 5 completeness score rules.

designs_cover_all_requirements.notes: All 28 ACs traced in module-design.md Section 8 traceability matrix. All 7 FRs, 3 NFRs, and 4 constraints addressed.

interface_contracts_reviewed.notes: Input contract matches M1/M2/M3 existing output formats. Output contract specifies all fields with types and validation rules. Backward compatible -- no M1/M2/M3 changes required.

cross_validation_completed_or_skipped.notes: Fail-open design ensures Phase 02 always completes regardless of M4 status.

Article_I_Specification_Primacy.evidence: All designs implement architecture specifications exactly: ADR-0001 (pipeline pattern -> Step 3.5 insertion), ADR-0002 (IA-4xx skill IDs), ADR-0003 (3-tier fail-open), ADR-0004 (opus model). No deviations from requirements.

Article_IV_Explicit_Over_Implicit.evidence: All design decisions documented explicitly. Defensive parsing rules specified for missing fields. Severity assignment rules fixed per finding type. No undocumented assumptions. No [NEEDS CLARIFICATION] markers remain.

Article_V_Simplicity_First.evidence: M4 is a single agent with 2 skills (minimum needed). Orchestrator change is one additional step. 5 finding types cover all cross-validation checks without over-categorization. No speculative features.

Article_VII_Artifact_Traceability.evidence: Traceability matrix in module-design.md Section 8 maps all 28 ACs to design sections and deliverables. Each finding type traces to specific ACs. API endpoints trace to ACs.

Article_IX_Quality_Gate_Integrity.evidence: All 9 GATE-04 checklist items pass. All required artifacts exist: interface spec, module design, wireframes, user flows, error taxonomy, validation rules, component spec.
